instructions:
Preheat oven to 400.
In small bowl, blend Hellmann's(R) or Best Foods(R) Real Mayonnaise, bread crumbs, cheese and garlic; fold in crabmeat. Evenly spoon mixture into mushroom caps.
On baking sheet, arrange mushroom caps. Bake 20 minutes or until heated through and lightly browned.
title: Crab-Stuffed Mushrooms
ingredients: 1/3 cup Hellmann's® or Best Foods® Real Mayonnaise
3 tablespoons Italian seasoned dry bread crumbs
